author: flo (tonebytone)
content:
Come to think of it, I haven't seen any public phone booths for ages! Perhaps they still exist in airports and train stations, but I don't know, as I haven't been inside any of these facilities for several years. The times, they is a'changin' and I find it hard to keep up!

I like your diptych. I've never seen public phones with red buttons!
